

###### (Automatically generated documentation)

# Set Building Scale (X/Y Centered, Z Grounded)

## Description
Scales geometry. X/Y are anchored to the bounding-box center. Z is anchored to the minimum Z (ground), preventing downward growth.

## Modeler Description


## Measure Type
ModelMeasure

## Taxonomy


## Arguments


### X Scale Factor

**Name:** x_scale,
**Type:** Double,
**Units:** ,
**Required:** true,
**Model Dependent:** false

### Y Scale Factor

**Name:** y_scale,
**Type:** Double,
**Units:** ,
**Required:** true,
**Model Dependent:** false

### Z Scale Factor

**Name:** z_scale,
**Type:** Double,
**Units:** ,
**Required:** true,
**Model Dependent:** false
